The image is an infographic centered around the theme of visual learning and information retention. It features a stylized eye illustration surrounded by statistics and facts:

1. "65% of people are visual learners" - This is placed above the eye and suggests that a majority of people prefer or benefit from visual learning.

2. "Content with visuals gets 94% more views" - Positioned on the left side, this statistic highlights the impact of visuals in content engagement.

3. "The average person reads only 20% of text on a webpage" - On the right side, this suggests that most people do not read all the text available on a webpage.

4. "People retain 80% of what they see, 20% of what they read, 10% of what they hear" - Below the eye, this provides comparative data on information retention based on sensory engagement. 

Overall, the infographic emphasizes the effectiveness and importance of visual content in communication and learning.
